tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Both the Doctors, Keerthana & Vinay Kumar Yadav explained the procedure in such a detail that I was left with no further questions.  Extracting the wisdom tooth was totally painless and even after one day, I am not feeling any pain.  Even post extraction, gargling with salt water, continuing the antibiotics till the cycle is complete is explained thoroughly.  I wish these Doctor all the Best and to get more and more opportunities to treat the people in the same way.

I had met with an accident a few months back which had resulted in facial fractures and lacerations. Dr.Vinay sir and Dr.Keerthana mam had treated me and had done a very fine job to make sure that the stitch marks are not visible to the eyes. I am very satisfied with the results.Very friendly doctors who are very responsive to all the queries and clarifies all our doubts very patiently. Definitely would recommend them to everyone.

I have visited VK Dental Care for my mother complete teeth implant at the age of 65 she got this treatment and recovered soon....All credits to Dr Vinay and Dr Keerthana both are very patient to answer to al our queries and soft spoken at same time very professional and clinic is very clean and hygiene.Equipments are top notch.Thank u Dr Vinay and Dr Keerthana ðŸ˜Š

I had a very good experience at VK dental clinic despite my anxiety. I visited them to get a missing tooth replaced. Dr Vinay performed implant surgery and it was completely pain free with minimal discomfort after procedure. I highly recommend VK dental care for all your dental requirements.
Overall treatment is good . The services were good and the staffs and doctors were excellent in all ways .
